meta.name: On Patrol: Live
meta.description: Hosting and executive producing On Patrol: Live is Dan Abrams, CEO and Founder of Abrams Media, host of Dan Abrams Live on NewsNation, Chief Legal Analyst for ABC News, and former host of Live PD. Joining Abrams is Sgt. Sean "Sticks" Larkin, retired Tulsa Police Department lieutenant with nearly 25 years of service, and Deputy Sheriff Curtis Wilson, Division Commander with the Richland County Sheriff's Department in Columbia, SC.

videos.title: #213 - Burglary in Progress at Officer's Home
#301 - Fire Station Invasion
videos.overview: Frederick officers search for a suspect with warrants; a suspect in Richland Co. breaks into a fire station.

videos.title: #302 - Massive Fire
videos.overview: Daytona Beach officers care for an injured animal; officers in Fontana respond to a massive fire.

videos.title: #303 - Storm Rescue
videos.overview: Arkansas officers capture a truck driver who ran after being stopped.

videos.title: #304 - Multiple Proposals
videos.overview: Brookford, North Carolina, officers face angry outbursts during a roadside traffic stop.

videos.title: #305 - Roadside Standoff
videos.overview: Indian River County, FL, officers investigate a domestic disturbance reportedly involving a knife.

videos.title: #306 - Fleeing Motorcycles
videos.overview: Toledo officers respond to a school shooting; Fontana officers pursue fleeing motorcyclists.

videos.title: #307 - Multiple Collisions
videos.overview: Frederick County, MD, officers find a driver who has fled from multiple accidents.

videos.title: #308 - Naked Bar Patron
videos.overview: Fontana officers search for a gun used in a shooting; Toledo officers deal with a naked man.
